snippet: The Obama administration also imposed sanctions against a handful of pro-Russian separatists and others blamed for fomenting the civil war that has torn apart Ukraine’s eastern regions.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration also imposed sanctions against a handful of pro-Russian separatists and others blamed for fomenting the civil war that has torn apart Ukraine’s eastern regions.

headline.main: U.S. to Give Ukraine’s Military an Additional $75 Million in Nonlethal Aid
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Give Ukraine’s Military an Additional $75 Million in Nonlethal Aid
